data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Gajapati. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gajapati, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Gajapati, Odisha, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Gajapati, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Gajapati, Odisha, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jatapu people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jatapu people.
Jesus, please help the 6,356 believers in the county of Gajapati to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Please, teach the 6,356 believers in Gajapati, Odisha, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Gajapati, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Gajapati
location.people_groups_list: Konda Dhora, Didayi, Hill Reddi, Korona, Kotia
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Konda Dhora (232,000), Didayi (11,000), Hill Reddi (400), Korona (800), Kotia (53,000)
